## tryParseBoolean() function

Tries to parse a `boolean` from a given character string and returns `undefined` if it can't.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function tryParseBoolean(value: string): boolean | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | string | The character string to parse. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean \| undefined

`true` if the string matches one of the accepted values, `false` if the string does matches one of the accepted values or `undefined` otherwise.
